name: MetroBEATdown
description:
(Sadly, this game is NON-FUNCTIONAL and only serves as a showcase. Instructions below are for context)

All Assets were created during the Game Jam, excluding sound effects used in the cutscene.*

Join Rhythm and Blues as they protect themselves against The Boss's men: The Goons™.

Will their love save the day? Or are they destined for heartbreak?

Press play to find out! This action-packed-rhythm-brawler will knock your pants off!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Rhythm (Red) can only block high attacks

Blues (Blue) can only block low attacks

Successfully time your blocks with the beat of the music and strike back to defeat your enemies!

The more on-beat you are, the more damage you deal!

Make sure to switch positions with Rhythm and Blues to successfully defend yourselves against The Goons™.

CONTROLS:

Left Click: Attack on Left  | Right Click: Attack on Right

A: Defend on Left  |  D: Defend on Right

SPACEBAR: Swap Positions

CREDITS:

Art & Animation: Alex Robinson & Emmalie Hall

Game Design: Alex Robinson, Bryson Kennedy, Emmalie Hall, & Trevor Holman

Lead Programming: Bryson Kennedy

Sound Design & Music: Alex Robinson

*cutscene sound FX are from freesound.org, all other sound FX are created by Alex Robinson.
